mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member( member_id, email, password, name, phone, address, sex, regdate, message_ok) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{sex}, sysdate, #{messageOk})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM member WHERE member_id LIKE #{memberId} AND password LIKE #{password}
mapper.select: SELECT member_id FROM member WHERE name LIKE #{name} AND phone LIKE #{phone}
